title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: It appears that the ServletContainerInitializer onStartup method is not behaving as expected. The output should be 'MySomeClass', but it is currently 'MySomeAnn'.
OB: When the onStartup method of the ModuleInitializer class is executed, the output is 'MySomeAnn' instead of 'MySomeClass'.
EB: The expected output when the onStartup method is executed should be 'MySomeClass'.
